column4: hi, I'd like to loop through a variable line by line in a bash script.. any ideas on how to do that?
I already know how to do it with a file (while read line etc), but not how to to it with a variable :)
pastebin how you think it should look to give me an idea and I'll give you working code
took a while, pastebin.com is painfully slow today: http://monoport.com/933
